类的使用
org.apache.http.impl.client.cache.CachingHttpClientBuilder

  • 使用CachingHttpClientBuilder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.http.impl.client.cache
    This package contains a cache module that can be used for HTTP/1.1 client-side caching.

    • org.apache.http.impl.client.cache中CachingHttpClientBuilder的使用

      返回CachingHttpClientBuilder的org.apache.http.impl.client.cache中的方法

      static CachingHttpClientBuilder CachingHttpClients.custom()
